author: PAUL WISEMAN and ANNE D'INNOCENZIO AP Business Writers
title: After virus fades, service industries may be changed forever
description: The coronavirus crisis is upending service businesses, and the crisis may permanently change the way Americans work, shop and socialize, even after the disease fades away
content:
WASHINGTON -- 
For years, personal trainer Amanda Tikalsky didnt have to worry much about her job. The U.S. economys record-breaking 11-year expansion offered security to service workers like her.
Then came the coronavirus, which closed the Milwaukee athlet… [+6158 chars]
